document.full_text: the authorities say one person has died and 10 have been hospitalized apparently after a mass overdose of a designer hallucinogen at a home in blaine, a minneapolis suburb.
document.title: midwest: minnesota: designer drug blamed in overdoses
lines_and_colors: the authorities say one person has died and 10 have been hospitalized apparently after a mass overdose of a designer hallucinogen at a home in blaine, a minneapolis suburb.
